description: | 404 | CHECK_OUT DATE MUST BE FURTHER IN THE FUTURE THAN CHECK-IN DATE|
| 424 | NO HOTELS FOUND WHICH MATCH THIS INPUT|
| 431 | CHECK-OUT DATE IS TOO FAR IN THE FUTURE THAN CHECK-IN DATE|
| 424 | NO HOTELS FOUND WHICH MATCH THIS INPUT|
| 431 | CHECK-OUT DATE IS TOO FAR IN THE FUTURE|
| 562 | RESTRICTED ACCESS FOR THE REQUESTED RATES AND CHAINS|

parameters.name: hotelIds
parameters.description: Amadeus property codes on 8 chars. Mandatory parameter for a search by predefined list of hotels.

parameters.name: adults
parameters.description: Number of adult guests (1-9) per room.

parameters.name: checkInDate
parameters.description: Check-in date of the stay (hotel local date). Format YYYY-MM-DD. The lowest accepted value is the present date (no dates in the past). If not present, the default value will be today's date in the GMT time zone.

parameters.name: checkOutDate
parameters.description: Check-out date of the stay (hotel local date). Format YYYY-MM-DD. The lowest accepted value is checkInDate+1. If not present, it will default to checkInDate +1.

parameters.name: countryOfResidence
parameters.description: Code of the country of residence of the traveler expressed using ISO 3166-1 format.

parameters.name: priceRange
description: Filter hotel offers by price per night interval (ex: 200-300 or -300 or 100).
It is mandatory to include a currency when this field is set.

parameters.name: currency
description: Use this parameter to request a specific currency. ISO currency code (http://www.iso.org/iso/home/standards/currency_codes.htm).
If a hotel does not support the requested currency, the prices for the hotel will be returned in the local currency of the hotel.

parameters.name: paymentPolicy
parameters.description: Filter the response based on a specific payment type. NONE means all types (default).

parameters.name: boardType
description: Filter response based on available meals:

parameters.name: includeClosed
parameters.description: Show all properties (include sold out) or available only. For sold out properties, please check availability on other dates.

parameters.name: bestRateOnly
parameters.description: Used to return only the cheapest offer per hotel or all available offers.

parameters.name: lang
description: If a language is not available the text will be returned in english.
404 | CHECK_OUT DATE MUST BE FURTHER IN THE FUTURE THAN CHECK-IN DATE
424 | NO HOTELS FOUND WHICH MATCH THIS INPUT
431 | CHECK-OUT DATE IS TOO FAR IN THE FUTURE
562 | RESTRICTED ACCESS FOR THE REQUESTED RATES AND CHAINS
790 | NO PROPERTIES FOUND WITHIN THIS RADIUS
795 | NO SIMILAR NAME FOUND, PLEASE ENLARGE YOUR SEARCH CRITERIA

parameters.name: offerId
parameters.description: Unique identifier of an offer. Either the GDS booking code or the aggregator offerId with a limited lifetime.

parameters.name: lang
description: If a language is not available the text will be returned in english.

properties.name: type
properties.description: the type of the object (hotel-offers)

properties.name: offers
properties.description: Hotel Offer

properties.name: id
properties.description: Unique identifier of this offer. Might be valid for a temporary period only.

properties.name: checkInDate
description: check-in date of the stay (hotel local date). Format YYYY-MM-DD
The lowest accepted value is today date (no dates in the past).

properties.name: checkOutDate
description: check-out date of the stay (hotel local date). Format YYYY-MM-DD

properties.name: roomQuantity
properties.description: number of rooms (1-9)

properties.name: rateCode
description: Special Rate - Provider Response Code (3 chars)
* ARP - AARP - American Association of Retired People (50+) (qualified)

properties.name: self
properties.description: A self link to the object. Use this to refresh the Offer price

properties.name: hotel
properties.description: Hotel Content

properties.name: hotelId
properties.description: Amadeus Property Code (8 chars)

properties.name: chainCode
properties.description: Brand (RT...) or Merchant (AD...) (Amadeus 2 chars Code)

properties.name: brandCode
description: Brand (RT...) (Amadeus 2 chars Code). Small Properties distributed by Merchants may not have a Brand.
Example - AD (Value Hotels) is the Provider/Merchant, and RT (Accor) is the Brand of the Property

properties.name: dupeId
description: Unique Property identifier of the physical hotel.
One physical hotel can be represented by different Providers, each one having its own `hotelID`.
This attribute allows a client application to group together hotels that are actually the same.

properties.name: name
properties.description: Hotel Name

properties.name: cityCode
properties.description: Warning: The IATA city code associated to the hotel (not necessary the real Hotel City)

properties.name: type
properties.description: the type of the object (hotel-offers)

definitions.name: Errors
definitions.description: A set of errors

properties.name: errors
properties.description: The Error Definition

properties.name: status
properties.description: The [HTTP status code](https://www.iana.org/assignments/http-status-codes/http-status-codes.xhtml) of this response. This is present only in terminal errors which cause an unsuccessful response. In the case of multiple errors, they must all have the same status.

properties.name: code
properties.description: A machine-readable error code from the Amadeus Canned Messages table, that will enable the API Consumers code to handle this type of error

properties.name: title
properties.description: An error title from the Canned Messages table with a 1:1 correspondence to the error code. This may be localized

properties.name: detail
properties.description: An easy-to-read explanation specific to this occurrence of the problem. It should give the API consumer an idea of what went wrong and how to recover from it. Like the title, this field’s value can be localized.

properties.name: documentation
properties.description: A link to a web page or file with further documentation to help the API consumer resolve this error

properties.name: type
properties.description: the type of the object (hotel-offers)

Example - AD (Value Hotels) is the Provider/Merchant, and RT (Accor) is the Brand of the Property

properties.name: dupeId
description: Unique Property identifier of the physical hotel.
One physical hotel can be represented by different Providers, each one having its own `hotelID`.
This attribute allows a client application to group together hotels that are actually the same.

definitions.name: HotelOffer
definitions.description: Hotel Offer

properties.name: type
properties.description: data type

properties.name: id
properties.description: Unique identifier of this offer. Might be valid for a temporary period only.

properties.name: checkInDate
description: check-in date of the stay (hotel local date). Format YYYY-MM-DD
The lowest accepted value is today date (no dates in the past).

properties.name: checkOutDate
description: check-out date of the stay (hotel local date). Format YYYY-MM-DD

properties.name: roomQuantity
properties.description: number of rooms (1-9)

properties.name: rateCode
description: Special Rate - Provider Response Code (3 chars)
* ARP - AARP - American Association of Retired People (50+) (qualified)

properties.name: rateFamilyEstimated
properties.description: The estimated rate code family of the offer. Grouping various rate plan codes that belongs to the same family and indicates the type of the rate

properties.name: code
properties.description: The estimated rate family (PRO,FAM,GOV)

properties.name: type
properties.description: The type of the rate (public=P, negotiated=N, conditional=C)

properties.name: description
properties.description: Specific type to convey a list of string for specific information type ( via qualifier) in specific character set, or language

properties.name: text
properties.description: Free Text

properties.name: lang
properties.description: see RFC 5646

properties.name: percentage
properties.description: Percentage of the commission paid to the travel seller. Value is between 0 and 100

properties.name: amount
properties.description: Amount of the commission paid to the travel seller. The amount is always linked to the currency code of the offer

properties.name: boardType
properties.description: The included Breakfast/Meals

properties.name: type
description: Room type code, 3 character identifier of the room.
The first character identifies the room type category.
The second numeric character identifies the number of beds.
The third character identifies the bed type.
There is a special case where ROH is returned, this value stands for Run Of House.

properties.name: adults
properties.description: number of adult guests (1-9) per room

properties.name: childAges
properties.description: Comma separated list of ages of each child at the time of check-out from the hotel. If several children have the same age, the ages will be repeated.

properties.name: price
properties.description: price information

properties.name: currency
properties.description: currency Code apply to all elements of the price

properties.name: sellingTotal
properties.description: sellingTotal = Total + margins + markup + totalFees - discounts

properties.name: total
properties.description: total = base + totalTaxes

properties.name: policies
properties.description: Booking Rules

properties.name: self
properties.description: A self link to the object. Use this to refresh the Offer price

properties.name: amount
properties.description: Amount of the cancellation fee.

properties.name: numberOfNights
properties.description: Number of nights due as fee in case of cancellation.

properties.name: percentage
properties.description: Percentage of the total stay amount to be paid in case of cancellation. Value is between 0 and 100.

properties.name: deadline
description: Represents the deadline after which the penalty applies. DateTime is in ISO 8601 [https://www.w3.org/TR/NOTE-datetime].
The value is expressed in the hotel local time zone, with the added time zone difference. So you can compute the deadline in UTC(GMT) if desired.

properties.name: bedType

properties.name: deadline
description: The date and time of the deadline in ISO 8601[https://www.w3.org/TR/NOTE-datetime].
Please note that this value is expressed in the hotels local time zone

definitions.name: HotelProduct_HotelPrice
definitions.description: price information

properties.name: currency
properties.description: currency Code apply to all elements of the price

properties.name: sellingTotal
properties.description: sellingTotal = Total + margins + markup + totalFees - discounts

properties.name: total
properties.description: total = base + totalTaxes

properties.name: taxes
properties.description: IATA Tax definition: An impost for raising revenue for the general treasury and which will be used for general public purposes.

properties.name: amount
properties.description: Defines amount with decimal separator.

properties.name: currency
properties.description: Defines a monetary unit. It is a three alpha code (iata code). Example: EUR for Euros, USD for US dollar, etc.

properties.name: code
properties.description: International Standards Organization (ISO) Tax code.It is a two-letter country code.

properties.name: percentage
properties.description: In the case of a tax on TST value, the percentage of the tax will be indicated in this field.

properties.name: included
properties.description: Indicates if tax is included or not

properties.name: description
properties.description: Example - "Governement tax"

properties.name: pricingFrequency
description: Specifies if the tax applies per stay or per night

properties.name: pricingMode
description: Specifies if the tax applies per occupant or per room

properties.name: markups
properties.description: Markup applied to provide a service or a product to the client. The markup can be introduced by any stakeholder. Typical use case is to convey markup information set by the travel agent or in case of merchant mode.

properties.name: amount
properties.description: Defines the monetary value with decimal position as a String.

properties.name: variations
properties.description: Daily price variations and the average daily price (when available) is shown here

properties.name: changes
properties.description: A collection of price periods if the daily price changes during the stay

definitions.name: HotelProduct_PaymentPolicy
definitions.description: Accepted Payment Methods and Card Types. Several Payment Methods and Card Types may be available.

properties.name: creditCards
properties.description: Accepted Payment Card Types for the `method` CREDIT_CARD

properties.name: methods
description: * CREDIT_CARD (CC) - Payment Cards in `creditCards` are accepted
* AGENCY_ACCOUNT - Agency Account (Credit Line) is accepted. Agency is Charged at CheckOut
* TRAVEL_AGENT_ID - Agency IATA/ARC Number is accepted to Guarantee the booking
* CORPORATE_ID (COR-ID) - Corporate Account is accepted to Guarantee the booking
* HOTEL_GUEST_ID - Hotel Chain Rewards Card Number is accepted to Guarantee the booking
* MISC_CHARGE_ORDER - Miscellaneous Charge Order is accepted
* ADVANCE_DEPOSIT - Cash is accepted for Deposit/PrePay
* COMPANY_ADDRESS - Company Billing Address is accepted to Guarantee the booking

definitions.name: HotelProduct_PolicyDetails
definitions.description: Booking Rules

properties.name: paymentType
properties.description: payment type. Guarantee means Pay at Check Out. Check the `methods` in `guarantee` or `deposit` or `prepay`.

properties.name: guarantee
properties.description: the guarantee policy information applicable to the offer. It includes accepted payments

properties.name: deposit
properties.description: the deposit/prepay policy information applicable to the offer. It includes accepted payments, deadline and the amount due

properties.name: amount
properties.description: Deposit-Prepay amount

properties.name: deadline
description: The date and time of the deadline in ISO 8601[https://www.w3.org/TR/NOTE-datetime].
Please note that this value is expressed in the hotels local time zone

properties.name: prepay
properties.description: the deposit/prepay policy information applicable to the offer. It includes accepted payments, deadline and the amount due

properties.name: amount
properties.description: Deposit-Prepay amount

properties.name: deadline

properties.name: holdTime
properties.description: the hold policy

properties.name: deadline
description: The date and time of the deadline in ISO 8601[https://www.w3.org/TR/NOTE-datetime].
Please note that this value is expressed in the hotels local time zone

properties.description: Amount of the cancellation fee.

properties.name: numberOfNights
properties.description: Number of nights due as fee in case of cancellation.

properties.name: percentage
properties.description: Percentage of the total stay amount to be paid in case of cancellation. Value is between 0 and 100.

properties.name: deadline
description: Represents the deadline after which the penalty applies. DateTime is in ISO 8601 [https://www.w3.org/TR/NOTE-datetime].
The value is expressed in the hotel local time zone, with the added time zone difference. So you can compute the deadline in UTC(GMT) if desired.

properties.name: checkOut
properties.description: Check-out Until time limit in ISO-8601 format [http://www.w3.org/TR/xmlschema-2/#time]

* MISC_CHARGE_ORDER - Miscellaneous Charge Order is accepted
* ADVANCE_DEPOSIT - Cash is accepted for Deposit/PrePay
* COMPANY_ADDRESS - Company Billing Address is accepted to Guarantee the booking

name: Amadeus_HotelSearch V3
about: Before using this API, we recommend you read our **[Authorization Guide](https://developers.amadeus.com/self-service/apis-docs/guides/authorization-262)** for more information on how to generate an access token.
Please also be aware that our test environment is based on a subset of the production for this API it may change dynamically. For your tests, use big cities like LON (London) or NYC (New-York).
